title: November 2025
content:
This November was a wonderful month filled with family celebrations and togetherness!

Thanksgiving at Carmen's

We spent Thanksgiving at Carmen's this year, and it was such a special gathering. The food was amazing, the company was even better, and we made so many wonderful memories together.

Our Thanksgiving celebration at Carmen's

Birthday Celebrations

We also celebrated Marion and Jacob's birthdays this month! It was so great to see everyone come together to celebrate these special occasions. Happy birthday to both of you!

  • Marion's birthday celebration
  • Jacob's birthday party
